entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
